languages.text: If the enemy on hit does not pass TOU test, they become Prone for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: If the enemy on hit does not pass TOU test, they become Prone for 1 round.

languages.text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the Arbitrator must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Враги, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} от арбитра, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Enemies hit by the Arbitrator must pass a Toughness resistance test or fall prone for 1 round.

Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the Arbitrator must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the Arbitrator must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Yargıcı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} düşmanlar, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilirler{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}golpeados{/g} por el Arbitrator deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o ser {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: 被法务官{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} par l'arbitrator doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, sans quoi ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralysés{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the Arbitrator must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} par l'arbitrator doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, sans quoi ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralysés{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: アービトレイターに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃された{/g}敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。

traits.locale_text: アービトレイターに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃された{/g}敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。

languages.text: Vom Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Gegner müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} zu werden.
